titles: The insinuating bawd and the repenting harlot written by a whore at Tunbridge, and dedicated to a bawd at the Bath.
author: Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.
publisher: Printed, and are sold by most booksellors,
notes: Attributed to Ward by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Date of publication suggested by Wing.
This work appears on reel 904:39 and 1107:10.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
